short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to FOMO and hello to endless entertainment options! Discover the most exciting events and activities happening near you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your new tab page with a curated list of events happening near you. You'll never have to worry about missing out on the latest concerts, festivals, exhibitions, and other fun events happening in your local area. Simply enter your zip code and let the extension do the rest.

Whether you're into music, arts, sports, or just looking for something new and exciting to try, we got you covered. 

Download the extension today and start discovering the best events happening in your area every time you open a new tab! 

☆☆ Features ☆☆ 

Event mode: enter a zip code and discover events happening near you.

Search mode: don't worry about leaving your search engine behind. Switch to search mode and continue searching using your default search engine.

☆☆ Privacy & Security ☆☆ 

For more information on our privacy policy visit https://www.eventspotter.app/privacy/. 

☆☆ Terms of Service ☆☆ 

For more information on our terms of service policy visit: https://www.eventspotter.app/terms/.
